entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Breton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Breton 07:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -18.9°C
Humidity: 83 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
